title: Bikkuriman: Kirakira Tokubetsu Zoukan-gou

alternative_titles.ja: ビックリマンきらきら特別増刊号

synopsis:
A special edition from the Bikkuriman TV series about sweets bonus stickers, which reorganizes the complicated story from the gathering of the Wakamiko to breaking through the Unconnected Zone at a good pace and summarizes it in an easy-to-understand manner.

(Source: U-NEXT)
